additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Extract (Baobab), Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract (Tasmanian Pepper), Glycerin, Cinnamomum Zeylanicum Bark Oil (Cinnamon), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Piper Nigrum (Pepper) Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, *Natural component of essential oils

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. We recommend patch testing before use, if irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use.For external use only.

description: Combines baobab extract and aloe vera to remove dirt and oil build-upA daily cleanser which removes a build-up of dirt and oil on the skin with a mix of baobab extract and Tasmanian pepper. Aloe vera helps to leave skin feeling refreshed, clean and hydrated.
name: Facial Cleanser For Men
